summary: Provides the core transformation stage of a 1‑dimensional UNet, applying configurable convolutional and optional attention/residual operations to the intermediate feature representation before it is handed to the decoder path.
business_intent: Enables modular and reusable mid‑network logic for audio, speech, or other time‑series deep‑learning models, supporting rapid development of UNet‑based solutions for denoising, segmentation, synthesis, and related signal‑processing tasks.
